title: Scam of "Free RP"
body: Why are people being sent with the "3800 Free RP" link through messages?... I know it's a scam. But why....

replies.body: Either they believe they will get rp when they Send it to others, the Accounts are botted or they are Stolen Accounts that now send the links to steal more.

Typically those scam sites are used to steal other's username names and passwords. Remember that Riot will never ask for your password, and check out this [**Phishing FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204230720) for some other tips to avoid those scams!
